thread.title: Santiago Salem
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by Santiago Salem

author: Santiago Salem
title: Santiago Salem
text:
The whole process was very straight forward and very professionak when proofing the project before putting it into production. Very responsive (and helpful) to questions and comments.
Final product is what I expected.
On the Digipaks there is a vey minor flaw, on some units there is a bit too much material on the back and front covers. Very small detail, not a real problem.
